last_episode_to_air.name: LOS ANGELES: Daredevil
last_episode_to_air.overview: Drummond re-creates the final, deadly trick of a Niagara Falls daredevil, plummeting in a wooden barrel into a small pool of water.

name: Death by Magic
overview: Magician Drummond Money-Coutts travels the globe, sharing his infectious love of his craft and attempting feats that proved fatal to other magicians.

episodes.name: CAPE TOWN: The Great Escape
episodes.overview: Drummond visits a college of magic just for kids, entertains with a beachside treasure hunt and puts himself in the path of a speeding train.

episodes.name: MIAMI: Head Under Water
episodes.overview: After intense training with a retired Navy SEAL, Drummond faces his lifelong aquaphobia and attempts to escape from a car before it floods with water.

episodes.name: DETROIT: Death by Audience
episodes.overview: After delighting Motown singers with sleight of hand, Drummond lets his audience make a choice that could bring a car crashing down on his head.

episodes.name: LONDON: Buried Alive
episodes.overview: Inspired by the Victorian obsession with taphephobia -- the fear of being buried alive -- Drummond attempts his own escape from a custom-built coffin.

episodes.name: LAS VEGAS: Against the Odds
episodes.overview: Drummond works his magic in a tattoo shop, then aims to beat the odds as his audience assists him with a variation on Russian roulette.

episodes.name: INDIA: The Rope Trick
episodes.overview: Paying homage to a legendary -- and gruesome -- magic trick, Drummond tries to escape from an iron cage suspended above flaming spikes.

episodes.name: EDINBURGH: Trial by Fire
episodes.overview: After recounting a magician's fiery death and the notorious history of witch hunts, Drummond risks being burned alive at the stake.

episodes.name: LOS ANGELES: Daredevil
episodes.overview: Drummond re-creates the final, deadly trick of a Niagara Falls daredevil, plummeting in a wooden barrel into a small pool of water.
